name: systematic-literature-review-a-c-on-infant-feeding-and-development-of-atopic-and-autoimmune-disease
title: Systematic Literature Review A&C on infant feeding and development of atopic and autoimmune disease
description: Systematic Review A assesses the evidence available on the influence of duration of total and exclusive breastfeeding, and timing of solid food introduction on the development of atopic and autoimmune disease, such as eczema, asthma, type 1 diabetes mellitus and food allergy.
